sentences.en: This past week, a plumber completed work at my residence.
sentences.cn: 上周，一位水管工在我的住所完成了工作。

sentences.en: At the age of 74, he is still going strong as the oldest plumber in business in Boise, Idaho.
sentences.cn: 尽管他已经74岁高龄，但身体依然很健壮，是爱达荷州博伊西市商界中最老的水管工。

sentences.en: In my view, it is just as great an achievement to be a plumber or a bricklayer as it is to be a lawyer or a doctor.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，做一名水管工人或者砖匠，同做一名律师或者医生相比，所取得的成就是同样伟大的。
